entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Hazy this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High 24. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Hazy early this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 May 2016
